TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginStatus extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 偵測使用者的驗證狀態，並切換登入或登出網站的連結狀態。

span.span: Detects the user's authentication state and toggles the state of a link to log in to or log out of a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項有兩種狀態，登入的網站並登出網站上，取決於屬性物件的屬性。The control has two states, logged in to the Web site and logged out of the Web site, determined by the property of the object's property. 控制項顯示的文字或影像的連結，根據設定和屬性。The control displays either a text or an image link, depending on the setting of the and properties. 您可以顯示文字或影像代表一或兩個狀態。You can display either text or images for one or both states. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中可用的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 使用者未登入時，站台控制項提供應用程式組態設定中所定義的登入頁面的連結。When a user is not logged in to the site, the control provides a link to the login page defined in the application configuration settings. 當使用者登入網站，控制項提供登出網站的連結。When the user is logged in to the Web site, the control provides a link to log out of the Web site. 從網站上的記錄清除使用者的驗證狀態和時使用 cookie 將會清除從使用者的用戶端電腦的 cookie。Logging out of the Web site clears the user's authentication status and when using cookies will clear the cookie from the user's client computer. 在網站中，任何後續造訪控制項將會顯示提示，以登入。On any subsequent visit to the Web site, the control will display the prompt to log in. 登出行為由屬性，指定是否要重新整理目前頁面、 將使用者重新導向至登入頁面定義應用程式組態設定中，或將使用者重新導向至指定頁面屬性。The logout behavior is controlled by the property, which specifies whether to refresh the current page, redirect the user to the login page defined in the application configuration settings, or redirect the user to a page specified by the property. 預設為重新整理目前頁面。The default is to refresh the current page. > [!NOTE] > 當使用者使用控制登出網站、 所有資料檢視中都呈現的狀態和所有的 post 資料都會遺失。When a user uses the control to log out of a Web site, all data present in view state and all post data is lost. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ```

summary.span: 建立組成 控制項的子控制項。

span.span: Creates the child controls that make up the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂控制項時，使用此成員主要由控制項開發人員類別。This member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class. 會呼叫這個方法由 ASP.NET 基礎結構，以通知使用組合為基礎的實作，包括衍生自控制項的任何控制項和，以建立任何子系所包含的控制項，以準備回傳或轉譯。This method is called by the ASP.NET infrastructure to notify any controls that use composition-based implementation, including controls that derive from and , to create any child controls they contain in preparation for postback or rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler LoggedOut;
.event class System.EventHandler LoggedOut
Public Custom Event LoggedOut As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ LoggedOut;

summary.span: 在使用者按一下登出連結且登出程序完成後引發。

span.span: Raised after the user clicks the logout link and the logout process is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者按一下 [登出] 連結並登出程序已完成之後，將會引發在伺服器上的事件。The event is raised on the server after the user clicks the logout link and the logout process is complete. 當使用者按一下 [登出] 連結，就會引發事件，然後執行登出程序時，最後再就會引發事件。When the user clicks the logout link, the event is raised, then the logout process is run, and finally the event is raised. 使用事件來提供額外的處理，例如清除資料庫連接，或移除每個使用者後使用者記錄檔時，網站的快取資料。Use the event to provide additional processing such as cleaning up database connections or removing per-user cached data after the user logs out of a Web site. 使用者的身分識別是時，仍然可以使用事件正在執行。The user's identity is still available while the event is executing. 如果您的處理常式，如事件將用戶端瀏覽器重新導向至另一個頁面，驗證 cookie 將會清除從用戶端。If your handler for the event redirects the client browser to another page, the authentication cookie will be cleared from the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將附加至事件處理常式事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 在此範例中的事件處理常式是空的。The event handler in this example is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/CS/loginstatusafterlogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/VB/loginstatusafterlogoutvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventHandler LoggingOut;
.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventHandler LoggingOut
Public Custom Event LoggingOut As LoginCancelEventHandler
public: event System::Web::UI::WebControls::LoginCancelEventHandler ^ LoggingOut;

summary.span: 在使用者按一下登出按鈕時引發。

span.span: Raised when the user clicks the logout button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下 [登出] 連結，將會引發在伺服器上的事件。The event is raised on the server when the user clicks the logout link. 登出程序不會發生此事件，在之前，以及使用者資訊仍然可用。The logout process does not occur until after this event, and user information is still available. 事件可讓您取消此登出程序，如果使用者必須在離開網站，例如購買購物車中的項目，或將變更提交至資料庫之前，完成的活動。The event allows you to cancel the logout process if the user must complete an activity before leaving the Web site, such as purchasing items in a shopping cart or submitting changes to a database. 您可以取消藉由設定事件屬性參數`true`。You can cancel the event by setting the property of the parameter to `true`. 使用事件來提供額外處理，例如使用者登出的站台之前，請清除每個使用者資料。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as clearing per-user data, before a user logs out of a site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將附加至事件處理常式事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 此事件處理常式更新表單上的欄位，然後取消 登出嘗試。The event handler updates a field on the form, and then cancels the logout attempt. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/CS/loginstatusbeforelogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/VB/loginstatusbeforelogoutvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用於登入連結之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the image used for the login link.

value.span: 字串，包含用於登入連結之影像的 URL。

span.span: A string containing the URL of the image used for the login link.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含用於登入連結之影像的位置。The property contains the location of the image used for the login link. 屬性會當做替代文字使用映像。The property is used as the alternative text for the image. 如果是空的屬性會呈現為連結。If is empty, the property is rendered as the link. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定特定映像的屬性。The following code example shows how to set the property to a specific image. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLoginImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginImageUrl/CS/loginstatusloginimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLoginImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginImageUrl/VB/loginstatusloginimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用於登入連結的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text used for the login link.

value.span: 顯示為登入連結的字串。

span.span: A string displayed as the login link.
The default is "Login".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會顯示為連結文字時屬性是空的。The property is displayed as the link text when the property is empty. 當屬性包含連結，屬性會當做替代文字使用映像。When the property contains a link, the property is used as the alternative text for the image. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following code example shows how to set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLoginText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginText/CS/loginstatuslogintextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLoginText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLoginText/VB/loginstatuslogintextvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.LogoutAction LogoutAction
Public Overridable Property LogoutAction As LogoutAction
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::LogoutAction LogoutAction { System::Web::UI::WebControls::LogoutAction get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::LogoutAction value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，用來決定當使用者以 控制項登出網站時所採取的動作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the action taken when a user logs out of a Web site with the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定哪一頁呈現給使用者時他或她會登出使用控制項。The property determines which page is presented to the user when he or she logs out using the control. 下表描述每個所採取的動作值。The following table describes the actions taken for each value. | 值 value|採取的動作Action taken| |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------| ||將使用者導向至 URL 中包含屬性。Redirects the user to the URL contained in the property. 如果是空的使用者重新導向至應用程式組態設定中所定義的登入頁面。If is empty, the user is redirected to the login page defined in the application configuration settings.| ||將使用者重新導向至應用程式組態設定中所定義的登入頁面。Redirects the user to the login page defined in the application configuration settings.| ||重新整理目前頁面。Refreshes the current page.| 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性值傳送給使用者，登入頁面。The following code example sets the property to the value to send the user to the login page. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutAction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutAction/CS/loginstatuslogoutactioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutAction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutAction/VB/loginstatuslogoutactionvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 屬性設定為無效的 值。

span.span: The property is set to an invalid value.

[!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutImageUrl/CS/loginstatuslogoutimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutImageUrl/VB/loginstatuslogoutimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定登出頁面的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the logout page.

value.span: 包含登出頁面之 URL 的字串。

span.span: A string containing the URL of the logout page.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為，使用者重新導向 url 中包含。When the property is set to , the user is redirected to the URL contained in . 如果設為任何其他值，內容屬性會被忽略。If is set to any other value, the contents of the property are ignored. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定登出頁面的屬性和屬性，讓使用者登出時重新導向。The following code example sets the property to a logout page and the property to so that the user is redirected when logging out. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl/CS/loginstatuslogoutpageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutPageUrl/VB/loginstatuslogoutpageurlvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the text used for the logout link.

value.span: 顯示為登出連結的字串。

span.span: A string displayed as the logout link.
The default is "Logout".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會顯示當屬性是空的。The property is displayed when the property is empty. 當屬性包含連結，屬性作為替代文字的瀏覽器不支援映像的映像。When the property contains a link, the property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not support images. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following code example shows how to set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusLogoutText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutText/CS/loginstatuslogouttextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusLogoutText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusLogoutText/VB/loginstatuslogouttextvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 在使用者按一下登出連結且登出程序成後，引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event after the user clicks the logout link and logout processing is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件來提供額外的處理，例如關閉資料庫連接，或清除每個使用者快取的資料之後使用者已登出網站。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as closing database connections or cleaning up per-user cached data, after the user has logged out of a Web site. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將附加至事件處理常式事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 在此範例中的事件處理常式是空的。The event handler in this example is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/CS/loginstatusafterlogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusAfterLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusAfterLogout/VB/loginstatusafterlogoutvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnLoggingOut (System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs e);

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 當使用者按一下 控制項上的登出連結時，引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when a user clicks the logout link on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件來提供額外處理，例如使用者登出的站台之前，清除每個使用者資料。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as cleaning up per-user data, before a user logs out of a site. 可以取消事件，因此您可以授與使用者離開網站前儲存資料，例如購物車或資料庫變更的選項。The event can be canceled, so you can give the user the option of saving data such as a shopping cart or database changes before leaving the Web site. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將附加至事件處理常式事件。The following code example attaches an event handler to the event. 此事件處理常式更新表單上的欄位，然後取消 登出嘗試。The event handler updates a field on the form, and then cancels the logout attempt. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/CS/loginstatusbeforelogoutcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginStatusBeforeLogout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginStatusBeforeLogout/VB/loginstatusbeforelogoutvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An containing the event data.

summary.span: 判斷使用者是否已登入，並取得登入頁面的 URL。

span.span: Determines whether a user is logged in, and gets the URL of the login page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷使用者是否已登入檢查屬性物件的屬性。The method determines whether the user is logged in by examining the property of the object's property. 如果使用者已登入，或屬性用來呈現控制項。If the user is logged in, the or property is used to render the control. 如果使用者未登入，或屬性用來呈現控制項。If the user is not logged in, the or property is used to render the control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: writer
param.span: 物件，表示對用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

span.span: A object that represents the output stream that renders HTML content to the client.

span.span: Renders the control to the specified control.

span.span: A object that represents the output stream that renders HTML content to the client.

span.span: Renders the contents of the control to the specified writer.

summary.span: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

span.span: This method is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 取得 控制項的 值。

span.span: Gets the value for the control.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓寫入適當的 HTML 標記的輸出資料流控制項。The property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the control. 屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。The property is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 您可以覆寫這個屬性來指定其用於衍生的控制項值。

span.span: You can override this property to specify which value to use for your derived control.
